Articles.Content:
An extremely devastating armor piercing missile, Unfortunately it is not that fast

![pbmX0XY.png](http://i.imgur.com/pbmX0XY.png)

Download the subassembly!:[http://www./download/levu9c2528z4519/HVAP_Missile.craft](http://www./download/levu9c2528z4519/HVAP_Missile.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T20:34:16Z" title="03/21/2015 08:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by daniel l.**
no speed makes it bad, mediafire makes it useless

> 
> no speed makes it bad, mediafire makes it useless

It can usually acheive about 200m/s wich is not that bad, And it does a ton of damage it can destroy almost any vessel using wingparts for armor or only single layer of heavy plating.

What's wrong with mediafire?
